resume.title: Divit Koradia
resume.objectives: Currently a first year Computer Science major at Northeastern University. Looking for a working opportunity in the Computer Industry during the summer of 2017. My aim is to work in a cutting-edge and challenging work environment, wherein I can effectively convert my innovative ideas into fruitful results.

work_experience.job: Software Developer for Fazlani L'Académie Globale School.
Developed a Student Council Voting System for the sports department of my high-school.

qualifications.education: Northeastern University Boston Class of 2020 - BS in Computer Science
Fazlani L'Académie Globale School (India) Class of 2016 - Diploma in International Baccalaureate
qualifications.additional_information: Fluent in English, French and Hindi.
Prior leadership roles in sports teams.
Volunteered at Muktangan NGO in India. Directed a play for their concert with the help of my classmates.
